column4: can someone help me? dualboot problem here, i dont know if i formatted my Windows partition with Ubuntu or not, i HOPE its still there, because i cant boot into my Windows
boot a live ubuntu cd and look at the partitions.
hold on mate, im going to my ubuntu pc and online from there, a sec
so how long 11.04 will be supported? is it ended this month?
: so if the support is stopped, i can't update it manually?
eol means eol.  NOt sure what kind of updates you would expect at that point.  Might I gently suggest you bite the bullet and upgrade to LTS releases?  12.04 is supported for 5 years ...
: so i need to upgrade to 11.10 and then ugprade again to 12.04
yep.  or clean install 12.04.  I recommend clean install then you can upgrade LTS to LTS.
you'll need to restore grub to get ubuntu booted
you can make 4 PRIMARY parts.  You can make unlimited(?) logical parts.
